quoteBurn(bool,(address,address,int8),ui.details: Static function so we do not need to save on SLOADsIf quoteBurn reverts, burn in Vault.sol will revert as well; vice versa is not true.

returns.amountCollateral: that would be obtained by burning a given amount of collateral

quoteMint(bool,(address,address,int8),ui.details: Static function so we do not need to save on SLOADsIf quoteMint reverts, mint will revert as well; vice versa is not true.

returns.amountTokens: that would be minted for a given amount of collateral

mint(address,uint256,(address,address,in.notice: This contract must be approved to spend collateral tokens.

priceOfAPE((address,address,int8)).notice: It returns the ideal price of APE if there were no fees for withdrawing.To get the price as [units of Collateral][per unit of APE], divide num by den.

priceOfTEA((address,address,int8)).notice: It returns the ideal price of TEA if there were no fees for withdrawing.To get the price as [units of Collateral][per unit of TEA], divide num by den.

swapAndMint(address,uint256,(address,add.notice: This contract must be approved to spend debt tokensThis function requires knowing the market price of the debt token in terms of collateral to choose a sensible minDebtToken
